column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Two Toed Ping says : " Hey , Mako .
#Text=" Two Toed Ping says : " I do n't know .
#Text=" Mako says : " I think you do know .
#Text=And you 're gon na tell me , or we 're gon na have to change your name to " No Toed Ping " .
#Text=" Two Toed Ping says : " Really , I do n't know .
#Text=You have to believe me .
#Text=We never met the guy who hired us .
#Text=" Mako says : " You expect me to believe that ?
#Text=" Two Toed Ping says : " After you left the hideout , some mook showed up and said his boss would pay us to keep you distracted .
#Text=We 'd never seen him before , and we ai n't seen him since .
#Text=Come on , Mako , you know how these deals work .
#Text=Please , I would never lie to you with my lucky toes on the line .
#Text=" Mako says : " Get out of here .
#Text=" Mako says : " Bolin , have you seen Varrick around ?
#Text=Bolin !
#Text=Nuktuk .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Yes ?
#Text=Oh , hello , Mako .
#Text=Did n't notice you there .
#Text=" Mako says : " Where 's Varrick ?
#Text=I need to ask him something .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Hmm .
#Text=Ca n't say that I 've seen him .
#Text=But I 've been kinda busy , you know , rehearsing for my big scene .
#Text=There 's gon na be some crazy " pyrotechnics " .
#Text=That 's mover speak for explosions .
#Text=" Assistant director says : " We need Nuktuk on set .
#Text=Running explosion scene .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Or sometimes we just call them explosions .
#Text=Anyway , wish I could stand around here and chitchat , but you know , I got ta go shoot my big scene .
#Text="
